file_content.text: Trail doubles back on itself....
Have we lost him?
What's our status?
No.... Sniper!
Don't rush yourself. This isn't a race, yet.
It's quiet, take your time.
He's close.... Down!
You've lead us to a dead end.
Some help you are.
Quiet. He's here.... Get down!
You two are good... real good. Even Artus never gave me this much of a run.
His name is Mandalore.
I know what he calls himself, boy. I was there.
I won your challenge, Jicoln. Surrender and I'll spare you a lot of pain.
Give it up. You've lost.
The game's not over until one of us falls, and I've still got some fight left in me.
Torian. Cool it. This isn't the time to lose your head.
Keep calm, kid.
Torian? No... you can't be.
That's no way to talk to your father.
Dad getting under your skin?
This is between me and him!
Artus swore he'd slaughter my boy at his mother's breast. He swore it when he left me here.
Sometimes I wish he had.
It's really you... Artus knows how to put the crowning irony on a vendetta.
We're not here for a reunion, remember?
Time for a gut check, Torian.
Just want him to know who kills him.
Torian's doing this for himself.
Mandalore didn't send him.
But does he know why?
It's too late for remorse.
You stripped our clan of its honor.
Today, I'm taking it back!
He's relaxing his step, must be getting close to home ground.
Blizz have to tell clan about this place! All water and scrap Jawa could want!
You know, we could be robbing a nice, dry, climate-controlled bank right now.
This is hard. I don't know how you guys do it.
Shorter strides... getting tired, Jicoln?
Hold... he's changed direction.
Why Blizz feet wrinkly?
Are we there yet?
This look like blood to you?
Not going to lose me that easily.
It's heading this way.
Blizz think... ulp! Blizz think maybe this water not for drinking....
Oh look, more mud. Lemme know when you find something.
I think I found a track-- nevermind, it's yours.
Trail's still strong.
Someone ransacked the stores here. Found a trail leading off. This way.
This where all the water kept?
I don't know what that kid was talking about, all I see is mud.
Are you sure we're going the right way? I don't see anything?
Hmm, looks right.
